blocks.name: ralcom4f
blocks.content: Commutation of restricted and unrestricted universal quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Mar-2017.)

blocks.name: rexcom4f
blocks.content: Commutation of restricted and unrestricted existential quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Mar-2017.)

blocks.name: 19.9d2rf
blocks.content: A deduction version of one direction of ~ 19.9 with two variables. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm 19.9d2rf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, w1)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s0, c1, w1)))
} = {
  mpd(w0, w1, wex(s0, w1))
  mpd(w0, wex(s0, w1), wex(s1, wex(s0, w1)))
  3syl(w0, wex(s1, wex(s0, w1)), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s0, c1, w1)), wex(s1, wrex(s0, c1, w1)))
  rexex(s1, c0, wrex(s0, c1, w1))
  eximi(s1, wrex(s0, c1, w1), wex(s0, w1))
  rexex(s0, c1, w1)
  19.9d(s1, w0, wex(s0, w1))
  nfexd(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  19.9d(s0, w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: 19.9d2r
blocks.content: A deduction version of one direction of ~ 19.9 with two variables. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: r19.29ffa
blocks.content: A commonly used pattern based on ~ r19.29 , version with two restricted quantifiers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm r19.29ffa(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1))), w2)
  -| wi(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w1), w2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
} = {
  syl(wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1))), w2, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wi(w1, w2), w1))))
  r19.29d2r(s0, s1, c0, c1, wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1))), wi(w1, w2), w1)
  adantr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(w1, w2))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wral(s1, c1, wi(w1, w2)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))
  ex(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w1, w2)
  simpr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
  rexlimivw(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wi(w1, w2), w1)), w2)
  rexlimivw(s1, c1, wa(wi(w1, w2), w1), w2)
  ancoms(wi(w1, w2), w1, w2)
  pm3.35(w1, w2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
